bill.summary: 4/23/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to two named individuals on behalf of their infant son in full settlement of all claims arising out of the failure of a physician of the U.S. Air Force to diagnose and treat an illness of such son.
